headline: Mercer Embraces AI to Deliver Better Outcomes for Clients; Launches AI Talent Capabilities, Workforce Insights and Aida
summary: NEW YORK, October 02, 2025--Today, Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, announced the launch of Workforce Insights, an AI-powered platform, to help organizations and human resources (HR) practitioners gain a complete view of their talent landscape and workforce dynamics.

content.title: Mercer Embraces AI to Deliver Better Outcomes for Clients; Launches AI Talent Capabilities, Workforce Insights and Aida
content.summary: NEW YORK, October 02, 2025--Today, Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, announced the launch of Workforce Insights, an AI-powered platform, to help organizations and human resources (HR) practitioners gain a complete view of their talent landscape and workforce dynamics.
